body:
Deleted my compilers.yaml and tried to create a new one but this happens

```┌[mamelara-edison06::spack
└┤[22:52] ➜ spack compiler find
==> Found no new compilers
```

It still writes to compilers.yaml and the yaml configuration looks correct but the output needs to be fixed.
title: spack compiler find on Cray says no new compilers found
